about_the_game:
Galaxy of Pen & Paper Complete Soundtrack!
44 minutes of 90's, Chiptune and Sci-fi inspiration.

Composed by Raphael Müller.

1. A Galaxy of Pen and Paper 01:38
2. Today's Episode 01:43
3. First Session 01:24
4. Boldly Go 02:58
5. Outer Space Jam 01:19
6. Mission Start 00:06
7. Dank Spaces 01:58
8. Something Lurks in the Dark 02:23
9. You Can't Take the 'Verse From Me 01:29
10. Mad to the Max 02:09
11. A Song of Ice and Ice 01:24
12. Permafrost 01:47
13. Chillin' on Fiery Grounds 01:17
14. Magmatronic 02:29
15. Dreams of an Electric HORSE 01:29
16. Good for Health, Bad for Enemies 01:52
17. D.I.C.E. 01:29
18. FINALLY, A Boss Fight 01:36
19. You Get Bonus XP For Random Babbling 01:26
20. Touched by His Noodly Appendage 01:56
21. Necronom-nom-nom... 01:45
22. This Is Acceptable 02:15
23. Two Ratburgers at the End of the Universe 01:24
24. Buy Stuff, Sell Stuff 01:54
25. Big, Fat, Smart Bug 02:30
26. DIE2K 02:32
27. Mission Complete 00:59
28. Victory 00:07

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8 or superior
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or superior
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities.
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: Galaxy of Pen & Paper - OST

package_groups.title: Buy Galaxy of Pen & Paper - OST

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP2 ou superior
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or superior
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities.
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
